localString.value: And what do you want?
Well those bloody miners managed to punch a hole right into a goblin nest when they were digging the new shaft.
Yeah I was just getting some men together but if you want to try I could offer you a reward, but I would need some short of proof.
Well the miners said they saw a fair large goblin shouting orders to the rest. I figure he was most likely the chief if you bring me he's head the reward is yours.
Can't says I blame you. Wouldn't go my self if I had a choice well we aint going till tomorrow so if you change your mind come and see me.
So changed your mind yet?
500 gold pieces.
I see you have the head - good work.
I'll just take that and give you your reward
Well I've gotten reports of undead in the sewers... you could look into that for me.
Well since there aint no proof there is anything down there we aint offering a reward but I might be able to find some gold laying about you could have if you'll go look.

Look... you helped me out with them goblins but if you don't want to go down there fine leave. If not, come back and give me a report about whats down there and I'll see what I can do about getting you a scouting fee.
Show this permit to the Hall of Council Jailer and he'll give you the key to the sewer entrance.
Hey <FirstName> good work with those goblins.
So changed your mind yet?
So what did you find?
Well I feared as much. Any sign of where they are coming from?
Well I'll send some men down there to find out what's going on. Here is your scouting fee.
Well I'll give you another 100 gold for finding thier spawning grounds.
Did you find anything?
Well keep looking.
Thank you for your service to your city <FirstName>. Here is your reward.
Thanks for all your help.
I heard there might be some trouble down in the mine, so I thought I might be of some help.
Let me guess you need someone to go in and clean them out.
What kind of proof?
Sounds a bit risky I think I'll pass on this one.
Deal, when I have his head I'll be back.
Yeah but what kind of reward we talking about?
Still sounds a little too risky.
OK, Guess I'll be going.
Anything else you might need done?
Any reward?
How much gold we talking about?
Ok I'll go.
Ok bye.
Yeah I'll do it
The reports are accurate, there are undead everywhere down there.
No I was unable to locate where they were coming from.
Wait, I could go down there again... for a price
OK I'll be back.
No I changed my mind. You should just send your men in
No not yet.
Yes there is an ancient crypt underneath the city. They appear to be coming from there.
